children.value: This experimental 3D data visualization shows totals for several counting stats from the 1949-50 NBA season through the year end of 2019. I wanted to see how much players contributed to their teams and the NBA overall, a little glimpse into their legacies. Older teams (e.g. Minneapolis Lakers) have been mapped to newer teams (e.g. Los Angeles Lakers).
